column3: Latest;Prey Veng province: A motorbike taxi driver was summoned by a suspect
column4: sent to a quiet place and killed for his motorcycle.------The incident occurred at 11:40 pm on June 21
column6: along a road in Chambok Chrum village
column9: Prey Veng province .------Local police officials said the victim was Phil Yun
column11: 49. His black Honda Dream 125 is missing. Reports say the man was stabbed from behind. ------NKD
